DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether protein-nutrition beverage increase muscle protein synthesis similar magnitude control beverage .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Protein-nutrition Beverages Muscle Protein Synthesis Women
DOC.detailed_description: Potential participant screen , eligible , invited participate . Body composition physical activity level assess initiation visit . During trial visit , woman receive protein-nutrition beverage ; muscle protein synthesis assess via blood analytes muscle biopsy rest exercise . Statistical analysis include mixed model regression approach change muscle protein synthesis primary outcome .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Older woman , 65 75 year age 2 . At least 5 year postmenopausal 3 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 20.0029.99 kg/m2 4 . Maintenance habitual diet , physical activity pattern , body weight throughout trial 5 . Low moderate habitual physical activity ( > 3500 < 10,000 steps/d , structured activity ) 6 . In general good health ( stage I hypertension allow 140/90 ) basis medical history ; take medication antihypertensive , selective serotoninreuptake inhibitor , and/or statin ( exclude simvastatin [ Zocor ] atorvastatin [ Lipitor ] ) 7 . Participant understands study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator . 8 . Participant consume protein drink allotted time frame 10 minute 1 . History presence clinically important renal gastrointestinal disorder , diabetes mellitus ( glucose > 126 mg/dL , fingerstick ) metabolic disease , unstable arrhythmia , angina , take antidiabetic , antiinflammatory , platelet inhibitor , anticoagulant medication . 2 . Vegan 3 . Smoker 4 . Overt osteoporosis and/or osteopenia and/or sarcopenia determine DXA 5 . High physical activity participate regular structure exercise ( > 10,000 steps/d ) 6 . History allergy , sensitivity , strong dislike towards component study product ( dairy protein ) 7 . Use investigational drug product within last 30 day 8 . Having participate another infusion protocol past year 9 . Individual condition PI believe would interfere ability provide inform consent , comply study protocol , might confound interpretation study result put person undue risk 10 .
